analysis.description:
EthicHubLending.doReclaim (/unique_chucks/15/0x2a84aa3b15369e850aa82136d8e7d2caf71e656b.sol#527-532) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- target.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/15/0x2a84aa3b15369e850aa82136d8e7d2caf71e656b.sol#531-532)

Reentrancy in EthicHubLending.constructor (/unique_chucks/15/0x2a84aa3b15369e850aa82136d8e7d2caf71e656b.sol#293-328):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(ethicHubStorage.getBool(keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(user,representative,_borrower))),Borrower not registered representative) (/unique_chucks/15/0x2a84aa3b15369e850aa82136d8e7d2caf71e656b.sol#304-305)
	- require(bool,string)(ethicHubStorage.getBool(keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(user,localNode,_localNode))),Local Node is not registered) (/unique_chucks/15/0x2a84aa3b15369e850aa82136d8e7d2caf71e656b.sol#307-309)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundingStartTime (/unique_chucks/15/0x2a84aa3b15369e850aa82136d8e7d2caf71e656b.sol#320-321)
